description:
Through projects designed in collaboration between
students and mentors, Collaboratory is a place to pursue
interests in experimental music realization, collaborative
composition, free and structured improvisation, electronic
music, or the realization of student compositional work.
Projects must be mentored. The project proposal must be
approved by both the mentor and the module coordinator
by the end of the semester prior to starting the project.
Projects should include consistent meetings (weekly or
fortnightly), guided by the mentor, and a public
presentation of the final musical result.
title: Collaboratory B
